title: Mystery gift
body:
Hi!

I ask for help! I own riot kayle and today i recived the mystery gift for riot's 10 years birthday. It popped up and i clicked on awesome. Now I don't know what did i get or that where's the mystery. Please help me if you can!

replies.body: The mystery gift is still one the way, you won't get everything all at once.  It will be a bit of time as we continue sending out gifts to everybody.   Keep an eye on our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) for any updates.  Patience!

by the way, the chest that you got is the icon, the gifts are still being distributed, with the 23rd being the final day. If you're absolutely sure you haven't received a mystery gift by then, I'd suggest making a support ticket. #totallydidntcopypaste
